text.head: Groton ( Connecticut )
text.p:
Groton
is a city in
Connecticut
. The tourist village of
Mystic
lies in the eastern part of Groton .
text.head: By car
text.p:
From either
New Haven
or
Providence
, take Interstate 95 to exit 30 , or U.S. Route 1 . From
Worcester
, take Interstate 395 to CT Route 85 , to Interstate 95/U.S . Route 1 .

text.head: See

list.item:
U.S. Navy Submarine Force Museum
, 1 Crystal Lake Rd , toll-free : +1-800-343-0079 . Mid May-mid Oct Daily 9AM-5PM . Winter : W - M 9AM-4PM . Tues . 1PM-5PM . I-95 , Exit 86 . World 's finest collection of submarine artifacts and home of the USS Nautilus , the first nuclear sub . Traces development of subs from Revolutionary War times . Admission , including self-guided tour of USS Nautilus , is free , but donations invited .

text.head: Do
Eat

list.item:
Koto Japanese Steak House
, 527 Long Hill Road . Although the name implies a steak house it is similar to Benihana in the Teppenyaki side of the house . But , where the place really shines is their sushi . The chef is a Japanese national who is very skilled and quite innovative at making sushi . They regularly import fish from Japan and it is fantastic . It rivals some of the best NY sushi restaurants and by far exceeds anything in the area .

Ninety Nine Restaurant
, 117 Long Hill Road , ☏ +1860 449-9900 .
